name: Troublehome
description:
The night has come, the zombies are out and kicking at your door!

QUICKLY, patch up those windows and make sure your home can withstand the onslaught for as long as possible!

Developed in 24 hours for the Magalu GameJam! (Yes in 24 hours 😳)

🌟 Twitter Game artist 2D/3D: Francisco Lucas @ciscookiess Francisco_ Unreal Engine Programmer:  Nathan Gabriel NeitherNathan @NeitherNathan Sound and music:  Patrick Stefano

@ptkstefano
